nodes.text: Gryffin Remus was a Human male who once served the Balmorran resistance until he joined the Sith Empire during the Cold War.

During Balmorra's liberation, Gryffin had crucial information on the resistance for the Imperial Command. He wanted to reveal these information to get attention of the Imperial occupation authorities and asked a Imperial spacer to whisper about him good word to Lieutenant Treshoda who was responsible for accepting defectors into Imperial ranks.
